text: Edit Material
Allows you to edit an existing USD material by modifying parameters and shader connections. This can be useful if the existing material is on a non-editable layer.
Overview
You cannot edit Karma VOP materials (Material Builder) with this node. You can only edit USD aspects of materials, such as material parameters.
How to
In the
Material path
parameter, enter the path to an existing VOP material in the USD scene tree.
Click
Load
. This node will recreate the material as a node inside this node’s network.
Dive inside this node (double-click the node in the network editor).
Edit the node’s parameters and/or connections.
To edit a parameter, first turn on the checkbox next to the parameter in the parameter editor. If a parameter is checked, the node will
overwrite
the material with the new parameter value. If a parameter is not checked, its old value is passed through unchanged.
The node’s output stage contains the edited version of the material, re-translated back into USD.
Number of Materials
This node can edit multiple materials at once. Set the number of materials you want to edit, or use the plus and minus buttons to add or remove edits.
Material Path
The path to the USD material primitive to edit. You can click the select button to the right of the text box to choose the primitive from the scene tree.
Load
Once you have filled in the
Material path
(above), click this to recreate the material as a VOP node inside this node’s network. Changing the parameters and connections on the recreated node is how you edit the material.
Material VOP
This is the name of the recreated VOP node inside this node’s network to use to edit the material. This is automatically filled in when you click
Load
